Title: Relates to certain deceptive acts and practices and the court's jurisdiction over such acts and practices
Summary: Provides that any claim for deceptive acts or practices against a distribution utility providing gas, electric or steam services to the public, the court shall have exclusive jurisdiction over such claim without regard to any defenses alleged; provides that in any claim for false advertising, the court shall have exclusive jurisdiction over such claim.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to certain deceptive acts and practices
